In order to support his wife, he established a small grocery store 7 years ago in the outdoor covered space of his home.  In this way he contributes to household and childcare expenses.  He is requesting his second loan in order to increase the inventory of his small business, including grains, snacks, soft drinks, and toilet paper.  His dream is to sell pork for a living.

loans.use: to increase the inventory of his grocery store.

loans.name: Integracion Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Integración se formó en la ciudad de Asunción, donde cada una está luchando por salir adelante y poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de su esfuerzo.
Se destaca entre ellas la Sra. Petrona, quien hace comidas y después la sale a vender. Comenta que todos los días empieza desde muy temprano, ya que se levanta a hacer sus comidas, ya que ella misma las prepara. Petrona pone todo de sí para poder crecer y salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser: verduras, carne, condimentos, hortalizas y demás, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir siendo alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
The group called Integración was formed in the city of Asunción, where each one is fighting to get ahead and to be able to help their loved ones through their efforts.  

Standing out among them is Petrona, who makes and sells food.  She says that every day she begins very early, because she gets up to make the food since she prepares it herself.  Petrona puts all of herself into growing and succeeding.  

She is requesting this loan to be able to buy ingredients for her food, such as vegetables, meat, condiments, produce and more.  In this way she will be able to continue with her work as she has been doing.  She is grateful for this opportunity to be able to continue being someone in life.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, condiments, produce, and more.

loans.name: Joseph's Group

texts.en:
Joseph is the leader of his group in Matete District and he is representing 8 farmers, including himself. Joseph joined One Acre Fund for the first time this season, but he has been a farmer for less than a year.

Like many other farmers, Joseph decided to work with One Acre Fund in order to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. He hopes that by joining One Acre Fund and using the seeds and fertilizer that he will get with this loan, he can join the ranks of One Acre Fund farmers that have doubled their harvest in their first year of the program. He plans to use the profits he earns from this year’s harvest to invest in a business.

Joseph's Group will use the farming inputs received with this loan to cultivate a total of 4.25 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light. So, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 7 solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season.

loans.name: Ana Juana

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Nueva Portoviejo de la  ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo de Crédito Alianza. 
En este lugar vive la señora Ana, tiene 46 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta  relación tienen  tres hijos mayores de edad, una de ellos aun vive en su casa. El marido es decorador de carros.
Doña Ana es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos por catalogo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella trabaja tres o cuatro días a la semana y aprovecha las horas de la mañana que sus hijos están estudiando para salir a realizar sus recorridos, también parte del crédito se lo da a su esposo el cual lo utiliza en su labor, el compra vidrios, películas, radios, parlantes y otros artefactos con los cuales decora carros, son muchas las personas que lo buscan para que él les realice sus trabajos y esto le deja muy buenos ingresos con los cuales saca adelante a su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos, radios, parlantes y otras cosas que utiliza su marido. Lleva más de 3 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Su sueño es seguir mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
In the citadel of Nueva Portoviejo in the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí known for many years as the city of the real tamarinds, the members of the Credit Group Alliance meet every 15 days.  

Ana, 46 years old, lives here. She is in a common-law marriage and from this relationship she has three grown children. One of them still lives with her at home, and her husband is a car designer. 

Mrs. Ana is a housewife that – in order to obtain her own financial resources to help her husband with the household expenses – makes a living selling clothing and shoes by catalogue. She sells door to door working three or four days a week and takes advantage of the morning hours when her children are studying to make her rounds. 

She will also give part of the loan to her husband, which he will use for his work. He will buy will glass, movies, radios, speakers and other devices to accessorize cars. Many people seek him out to perform this work, and this allows him to have a good income to support his family.  

Ana’s loan is to buy clothing, shoes, radios, speakers and other things used by her husband. She has been in the Credit Group Alliance for more than three years, and she likes it because the loans are fast. Her dream is to continue improving her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, radios, speakers, etc.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru:
Нигора молодая и трудолюбивая девушка 26 лет. Она родилась и выросла в городе Истаравшане в семьи рабочего.  Она  замужем и имеет троих детей. Её мужа зовут Носир. Нигора занимается животноводством и дехканством. Её муж работает на производстве кирпичей разнорабочим.  У него чистый доход в месяц составляет 1000-1100 сомон . Нигора  хорошая и спокойная женщина. 
 В данное время Нигора вместе со своим мужем хотят построить дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Нигора обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Nigora is a hardworking young woman of 26. She was born and raised in the city of Istaravshan in a family of workers. She is married and has three children. Her husband is called Nosir. Nigora works in animal husbandry and agriculture. Her husband works as a labourer producing bricks. He has a net monthly income of 1,000 to 1,000 somon. Nigora is a good and peaceful woman.

Nigora and her husband currently want to build a house where they will have good living conditions. For this she has approached Arvand for a loan to purchase building materials to build a house. She hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Muslima

texts.ru: Муслима  молодая девушка 24 лет. Она родилась  в кишлаке Далян  Ганчинского  района в семье  дехкан. Она  в разводе и одна воспитывает двух   детей. Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Муслима начала свой бизнес. Она занимается животноводством. Муслимп выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Муслима получает хороший доход.Её доход хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у неё недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Муслима хочет купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Муслима заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Muslima is a young woman of 24. She was born in the town of Dalyan in the Ganchinsky region to a family of farmers. She is divorced and raising two children on her own. In order to have a steady income she has started her own business in animal husbandry. She raises cattle and then sells their milk and meat. She receives a good income from this business and her income covers the basics, but she doesn't make enough yet to cover all of her needs. 

Muslima wants to buy a few more head of cattle to fatten. Therefore she has approached Arvand and wants to take out a loan to purchase cattle. She thanks Arvand in advance for the support, which will help her improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Rimba

texts.en:
Rimba is a married man with one child. He describes himself as honest. He operates a food stall where he cooks food to sell. He has been involved in this business for 1 year and his primary customers are students.

His biggest business challenge is the lack of enough space. He will use the 50,000 KES loan to buy ingredients for preparing food. His business goal is to open more branches within 5 years. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing food.

loans.name: Esau

texts.en:
Esau is a 42-year-old married man with 4 children living in Fort Portal Uganda. He operates a business growing matooke and also has a taxi transport business that provides him more income.

He is faced with the challenges of changes in weather plus the banana bacterial wilt affecting his banana plantation and his sales in the long run. However, he has future prospects of expanding his banana plantation to a bigger area so as to increase his harvests. Esau has asked for a loan to mulch his banana plantation.

loans.use: to mulch his banana plantation.

loans.name: Sarvinoz

texts.ru: Сарвинозу аз Турсунзаде 26 лет. Она в этом городе очень давно живет. И живет она вместе с мужем. Сарвиноз милая и ответственная женщина, всегда умевшая сохранить в доме уют, тепло и удобства для своего мужчина. Ее муж рабочий-строитель. У Сарвиноз нет высшего образования. Но есть талант в области шитья женских национальных платьев. Ей очень нужно швейная машина, но у нее нет денег. По этой причине она остро нуждается в кредите.
texts.en: Sarvinoz, from Tursun-zoda, is 26 years old. She has lived there for a very long time. She lives with her husband. Sarvinoz is a nice and responsible woman who always knows how to keep the home comfortable, warm and cozy for her man. Her husband is a construction worker. Sarvinoz does not have a higher education. But she does have a talent for making traditional dresses. She really needs a sewing machine, but she has no money. For this reason, she is in dire need of a loan.

loans.use: get a modern sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more shaping and cutting tools to enable him to carve more items for sale in the market and make more profits for his family's consumption.

loans.name: Tomas Alberto

texts.es:
Tomas, de 26 años de edad, es un joven ganadero, está casado y es padre de 2 hijos.
Tomas, tiene muchos años de experiencia en la ganadería, ya que desde pequeño su padre le inculco el negocio del ganado y su administración, se dedica también a la venta de leche todos los días.

Tomas, necesita el préstamo para comprar alimento para el ganado y para mejorar las instalaciones donde permanecen el ganado, todo para que el rendimiento en la producción sea mayor.

Tomas, sueña con crecer rápidamente en el negocio, igual como lo ha conseguido su padre, comprando más ganado y obteniendo una utilidad optima para el desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Tomas is a 26 years old rancher. He is married and have 2 children.

Tomas has many years of experience in ranching. Since childhood, his father instilled the cattle business and management. He also sells milk every day.

Tomas requests a loan to buy food for cattle and to improve facilities where cattle are kept. These will yield better production.

Tomas hopes to grow his business quickly just as his father succeeded. Buying more cattle and obtaining optimal use are for his business development.

loans.use: to buy food for cattle and to improve facilities where cattle are kept.

loans.name: Zipporah's Group

texts.en:
Zipporah, pictured above, is a group leader and is representing her group, formed by 15 farmers in Matete District, Kenya. She joined One Acre Fund for the first time in 2011 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers. She is married and has 4 children.

With a portion of this loan, Zipporah will not only purchase maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, but also a solar light. Receiving a solar light as part of her loan means that now she will be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. Zipporah plans to use the profits she gains this year to buy a cow.

In total, Zipporah’s Group will use the inputs received from this loan to plant a total of 9.75 acres of land. They will also receive a total of 15 solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient-maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Afwa

texts.fr: Afiwa est une femme veuve et âgée de 50 ans. Afiwa habite dans le quartier d’Adidogomé et s’active dynamiquement pour subvenir aux besoins quotidiens qu’elle éprouve. Afiwa vend de la pâte bandée et des poissons dans son quartier et arrive à gagner son profit grâce à cette activité. Afiwa achète ses provisions une fois par mois et sollicite ce prêt pour commander quelques bols de  maïs et un carton de poissons. Afiwa désire augmenter son bénéfice et améliorer ses prestations.
texts.en:
Afiwa is a 50-year-old widow, who lives in the Adidogome neighborhood and actively attempts to meet her daily needs with dynamism.

Afiwa sells maize balls and fish in her neighborhood and manages to make some profit through this activity. She resupplies once a month and is requesting this loan to order some bowls of maize and boxes of fish.

Afiwa wishes to increase her earnings and improve her performance.

loans.use: buy 67 bowls of maize and 2 boxes of fish

loans.name: John's Group

texts.en:
John, pictured above, has five children and is always described as a very experienced farmer, which is why he was selected to become the leader of his group. John is representing his group of eight farmers in Matete District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

John has been a farmer for 18 years and, in order to earn enough to feed his family, he decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. His loan will not only include farming inputs but also two solar lights, which he is very happy to be getting as that means he will now reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this coming season, John is planning to buy a cow.

A total of 4.5 acres will be planted by John's Group, and between them, they will receive a total of seven solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana es una persona muy sacrificada que estudia para poder salir adelante e ir mejorando como persona y como profesional, busca ser el ejemplo de sus hijos y una ayuda para su marido, esta estudiando aun su carrera de ciencias en la educación y se ve dentro de poco enseñando. Comenta que su préstamo anterior le fue de mucha ayuda, por eso pide este préstamo para poder pagar nuevamente las cuotas de su carrera y poder seguir estudiando.
Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe.
texts.en:
Ana is a very self-sacrificing person who goes to school to be able to keep moving forward and improving herself as a person and a professional. She seeks to be an example for her children and a help to her husband. She is pursuing a degree in education science, and she will begin teaching very soon.

She says that her previous loan was very helpful to her, so she is requesting this loan to again be able to pay her college tuition and continue studying. She is thankful for this new opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: to pay college tuition

loans.name: Rukhsat

texts.ru: Рухсат живет с семьей в маленьком городке Турсунзаде. Она мама и бабушка. К сожалению ее мужа рядом нет. Рухсат уже 20 лет занимается животноводством. Эту деятельность она унаследовала у своих родителей и те от своих предков. Рухсату уже 62 года. Работать на скотном дворе ей помогают внуки после школы. Для Рухсат животноводческая деятельность является очень важным. Сейчас она хочет расширить деятельность и купить несколько голов телят. Но так как у нее нет достаточной суммы денег, она обратилась за кредитом. Она верит, что ее поддержат, и заранее благодарит Вас за помощь.
texts.en: Ruhsat lives with her family in the small town of Tursun-zoda. She is a mother and a grandmother. Unfortunately, her husband's not around. Ruhsat has been working in animal husbandry for 20 years. She inherited this job from her parents and from their ancestors. Ruhsat is 62 years old. After school, her grandchildren help her with her work in the barnyard. Livestock is very important to her. Now she wants to expand her business and buy a few head of calves. But since she does not have enough money, she applied for a loan. She believes that you will support her, and she thanks you in advance for your help.

loans.use: buy cattle to expand her business.

loans.name: Ra'no

texts.ru: Раъно 38 летняя женщина. Она замужем и мать двоих сыновей. Раъно вместе семьей живет на районе Шахритус. Муж занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Раъно 19 лет своей жизни работает медсестрой в больнице. Она опытная медсестра, ей в работе нравится ухаживать о пациентах и помочь людям. Раъно добрая и шустрая женщина. Она еще занимается выращиванием скота у себя во дворе. Раъно покупает скота и откармливает их в течение нескольких месяцев, прежде чем принимать их на рынок перепродажи. Она нуждается в кредите для продолжения деятельности. Раъно на сумму запрашиваемого кредита хочет приобрести скота и расширить деятельность. Ваша поддержка поможет ей и дальше продолжать животноводство и не остаться без источника дохода.
texts.en: Ra'no is a 38-year-old woman. She is married and the mother of two sons. Ra'no lives with her family in Shahrituz. her husband farms. Ra'no has been a hospital nurse for 19 years. She is an experienced nurse. She likes to care for patients and help people. Ra'no is a kind and mischievous woman. She raises cattle in her barn yard. Ra'no buys cattle and fattens them for a few months before taking them to the resale market. She needs a loan to continue the work. Ra'no will use the money to buy cattle, and she wants to expand her business. Your support will help her continue to keep livestock and to not be left without a source of income.

loans.use: buy cattle to expand her business.

loans.name: Derick's Group

texts.en:
Derick's Group is formed by 10 farmers in Matete District and is being represented by Derick, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 30 years old, married and has one child. Derick has been a farmer for two years and is often referred to as a very reliable person.

Derick isn’t new to One Acre Fund. He actually joined the program in 2013 and has since noticed his life has changed, especially in the sense that he has been able to consistently feed his family ever since. This year, Derick will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase a solar light. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to have light during the night and have somewhere to charge his phone.

Using this loan, Derick's Group will purchase a total of 10 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of five acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Pyalo

texts.fr: Agée de 43 ans, Pyalo est une femme mariée et vit à Avédji. Mère de trois enfants, Pyalo vend des ignames  dans le quartier et ses environs pour fournir ses clients. Pour avoir un stock toujours disponible, Pyalo s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pyalo désire commander des calebasses d’ignames pour s’équiper et nécessite ce fonds pour réaliser son achat afin avoir une rentabilité lui permettant de soutenir les charges de sa famille.
texts.en:
43-year-old Pyalo is married and lives in Avédji. Mother of three children, Pyalo sells yams in her neighborhood and its surrounding area to serve her customers.

To ensure the availability of her stock, Pyalo resupplies twice a month at the market. She wants to order gourds of yams to restock her supply and is requesting this loan to make that purchase and ensure profits enabling her to support her family's expenses.

loans.use: buy 5 gourds of yams

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is a resident of the town of Antequera, Bohol. She is married woman with three grown children.  She makes and sells native baskets. She has been engaged in weaving baskets for eight years now. She is in need of capital to support her existing source of income.

She is asking for a loan to buy materials like wicker (a woven fiber formed into a rigid material), and nito (a kind of fern, its stem used in making baskets). These materials are essentials in producing more baskets to weave. She could now cater to more orders from her customers and it would enable her to augment her earnings.

Thus, she could now expand her basket weaving livelihood to become successful in the coming year.

loans.use: to buy materials like wicker (a woven fiber formed into a rigid material), and nito (a kind of fern, its stem used in making baskets)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts to sell in the market and to use to maintain his motorcycle

loans.name: Rahatai

texts.ru: Рахатай, 49 лет, не замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование, работает уборщицей в Управлении Внутренних Дел, получая заработную плату в размере 6,000 сом (KGS). Рахатай живет в собственном доме, она решила пристроить летнюю кухню к дому, поэтому обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку кирпича, цемента, шпаклевки. Рахатай является участником группы "Миножат", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их трое. Доходы от заработной платы она и дальше планирует вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Rahatai is 49 years old, unmarried, and the mother of 2 children. She has a vocational education and works as a cleaner in the Office of Internal Affairs where she receives 6,000 som (KGS) per month. Rahatai lives in her own house. She decided to attach a summer kitchen to the house and went to the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to buy bricks, cement, and spackle. Rahatai is a member of the group "Minozhat", which consists of her and two others. She plans to invest her income into further improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and mortar to build a summer kitchen near her home.

loans.name: Viimdoogo Group

texts.fr:
Madame AISSA est la représentante du groupe VIIMDOOGO.  Mariée, elle est mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 09 ans et le moins âgé a 34 mois.  02 vont  à l’école. 
Madame est commerçante d’habits  depuis  10 ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son quartier.Ses clients sont les habitants de son quartier.
Elle  veut s’acheter une douzaine de chaussures et 20 pièces de pagnes.
Madame veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour s’occuper  de sa famille. Elle ambitionne ouvrir une boutique.
texts.en:
Mrs. Aissa represents the Viimdoogo group. She is the married mother of three children, the eldest of whom is nine years old and the youngest less than three years old. Two of them attend school.

She has been trading clothes over the past ten years. She restocks at her local market, and her customers are neighborhood residents.

She wants to buy a dozen pairs of shoes and 20 lengths of pagnes (colorful West-African fabric). She wants to use her profits to take care of her family, and her ambition is to open a shop.

loans.use: buy a dozen pairs of shoes and 20 lengths of pagnes

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru:
Дилафруз молодая и жизнерадостная женщина 32 лет. Она замужем  и мать троих детей. Дилафруз очень трудолюбивая женщина. Она  занимается животноводстве. Дополнительный доход семьи от производства сельхозпродуктов. Её муж работает мастером на стройке и получает небольшую прибыль. В зимний период он занимается откорм скота . Но этой прибыли не хватает на хорошее проживание. Её муж хочет уехать на заработки. 
Дилафруз мобратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку билета для мужа. Она очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Dilafruz is a cheerful young woman, 32 years old. She is married and the mother of three children. Dilafruz is a very hardworking woman. She works in animal husbandry. The family earns additional income from agriculture. Her husband works as a foreman at a construction site and he earns a small salary. In winter, she fattens cattle. But the money they make is not enough for a good living. Her husband wants to go to work.

Dilafruz approached Arvand and wants to get a loan to buy a ticket (to work abroad) for her husband. She has high hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy a ticket

loans.name: Zarina

texts.ru: Зарина всегда отличалась вежливостью, старательностью, активностью и стремлению к своей цели. Она портниха. Ей 28 лет. Зарина твердо знает свое призвание в жизни. Зарина мама двоих детей и верная супруга. На данный момент ее муж безработный и помогает ей в домашних делах. В дом доход приносит только Зарина. Зарине очень нравиться шить, творить, создавать новую одежду. Зарина нуждается в помощи. Ей необходимо срочно купить новую машинку. Ее машинка устарела и если она не сможет приобрести новую, она и ее семья лишится источника дохода. Зарина и надеется сохранить деятельность. Поддержите ее.
texts.en: Zarina is always courteous, diligent, active and goal-oriented. She is a dressmaker. She is 28 years old. Zarina knows her vocation in life. Zarina is the mother of two children and a faithful spouse. At the moment, her husband is unemployed and helps her around the house. Zarina brings in the only income. Zarina really likes to sew, create, and make new clothes. Zarina needs help. She urgently needs to buy a new sewing machine. Her machine is old, and if she can not buy a new one, she and her family will lose their source of income. Zarina hopes to keep her job. Support her.

loans.use: buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa sends you her sincerest 'thank you' for showing trust in her. She was able to use the PHP 20,000 financial assistance to buy more ingredients she needed in her spring roll business. Her profit from the business also helped support the daily needs and expenses of her family.

She wants to make more spring rolls for her growing number of customers. She will be needing a new loan worth 20,000 PHP to purchase additional supplies and raw ingredients to make this happen. She aims to increase her earnings so she can expand soon and be able to save for her dream factory of Marissa's special spring rolls. She also aspires to see her children fulfill their dreams by giving them the best education possible.

Marissa meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her spring roll business.

loans.name: Maysara

texts.ru: Майсаре 53 лет. Она замужем и мать троих детей. Детям 24, 20 и 18 лет. Майсара честная и трудолюбивая женщина района Шахритус. Она в родном районе  занимается растениеводством. Майсара занята этой деятельности уже 6 лет. Ей на работе помогает муж и дети. Растениеводство является семейной деятельностью. Ей сейчас надо готовить почву для посева урожай. Майсара обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и качественные семена урожай. Она надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Maysara is 53 years old. She is married and the mother of three children. They are 24, 20 and 18. Maysara is an honest and hardworking woman from Shahrituz. She has farmed for the last six years. Her husband and children help. Crop production is a family operation. It is now necessary to prepare the soil for planting crops. Maysara applied for a loan to buy fertilizer and quality seed. She looks forward to your support.

loans.use: buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Minozhat

texts.ru: Миножат, 55 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее высшее образование, уже 25 лет работает уборщицей в Управлении Внутренних Дел, получая заработную плату в размере 6,800 сом (KGS). Миножат решила достроить летнюю кухню у дома, поэтому обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку досок, шпаклевки и оплаты услуг строителей. Миножат является участником группы "Миножат", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их трое. Доходы от заработной платы она и дальше будет вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Minozhat is 55 years old, married and a mother of 2 children. She has a college education and has been working as a cleaning lady at the Internal Affairs Department for 25 years, earning a salary of 6,800 som (KGS). Minozhat decided to finish building a summer kitchen in her house and requested a loan in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy wood, plaster and pay for construction worker services. Minozhat is a member of the Minozhat group that, besides her, consists of 2 more people, with 3 of them all together. She will continue investing the earnings from her salary into improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy wood, plaster and pay for construction worker services in order to finish building a summer kitchen in her home

loans.name: Gladys's Group

texts.en:
Gladys is 46 years old and has nine children. She is a group leader and is representing her group of 10 farmers in Matete District, Kenya. 

Gladys has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to earn enough to feed her family and, although she described her last harvest as good, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Gladys also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that Gladys's Group will be able to receive a total of eight solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 5.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Aguaclara Group

texts.es:
Es un grupo mixto, está conformado por 2 mujeres y 1 hombre luchador (CATALINA, EMENENCIA LIZETH y ZELAYO) de la etnia miskita, viven en Bilwi, del municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Son hombres y mujeres emprendedoras que luchan día a día por hacer crecer sus pequeños negocios. Se organizaron hace un año para acceder a préstamos con garantía solidaria en Pana Pana.

EMENENCIA LIZETH: Es la coordinadora del grupo solidario, es una mujer jovial, madre soltera de 6 hijos: 2 son mayores de edad e independientes y 3 adolecentes que estudian su secundaria y un menor de edad de 5 años. Con el propósito de sacar adelante a sus hijos, desde hace 16 años vende frito, enchiladas, refrescos naturales. Está solicitando financiamiento para comprar insumos e ingrediente para la elaboración de fritos, refrescos y enchiladas: filipitas, vinagre, aceite, tomate, pepino, repollo, maseca, achote, frutas, azúcar, entre otros productos. Ella sueña en construir su vivienda de concreto y vender ropa usada.
texts.en:
This is a diverse group, formed by 2 women and 1 hard-working man (Catalina, Emenencia Lizeth, & Zelayo) of Miskita heritage. They live in Bilwi, which belongs to the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. They are enterprising men and women that fight every day to grow their small businesses. They organized a year ago in order to access loans with solidarity guarantee through Pana Pana.

Emenencia Lizeth: She is the coordinator of the solidarity group. She is a cheerful woman, the single mother of 6 children. 2 are adults and independent, 3 are adolescents who go to high school, and one little one is 5 years old.

With the goal of supporting her children, for the past 16 years, she has sold fried snacks, enchiladas, and natural soft drinks. She is requesting a loan to buy supplies and ingredients to prepare fried snacks, soft drinks, and enchiladas: filipitas [a type of banana], vinegar, oil, tomato, cucumber, cabbage, corn flour, annatto, fruit, sugar, and other products. She dreams of building her house out of concrete and selling used clothing.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients to make fried snacks, soft drinks, and enchiladas

loans.name: Joyce's Group

texts.en:
Joyce, pictured above, is a group leader and is representing her group of eight farmers in Matete District, Kenya. She joined One Acre Fund for the first time in 2011 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to spread the story of One Acre Fund farmers. She is married and has four children.

With a portion of this loan, Joyce will not only purchase maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, but also a solar light. Receiving a solar light as part of her loan means that now she will be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. Joyce plans to use the profits she gains this year to buy a cow.

In total, Joyce’s Group will use the inputs received from this loan to plant a total of 5.5 acres of land. They will also receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Burikhol

texts.ru: Бурихолу 57 лет. Она домохозяйка. Бурихол умеет шить и шила только для себя и детям. Платья, которые вы видите на фотографии, она тоже сама сшила. Теперь Шарифамо пользуется своим талантом и принимает заказы на шитье одежды. Ее машинка сильно устарела и она хочет купить профессиональную швейную машинку на сумму от кредита, чтобы брать больше заказов на шитье национальных платьев. Бурихол надеется в дальнейшем развить свой маленький бизнес.
texts.en: Burikhol is 57 years old. She is a housewife. Burikhol knows how to sew, and she sews for herself and her children. The dresses that you see in the picture she sewed herself. Now Burikhol uses her talent and takes custom orders for clothes. Her machine is outdated and she wants to buy a professional sewing machine so she can sew traditional dresses. Burikhol hopes, in the future, to start a small business.

loans.use: buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
La alegría de María es muy notable cuando se le escucha hablar del progreso de su negocio. Anteriormente, ella había solicitado préstamos con los cuales invirtió en alimentos crudos para cocinarlos y vender comida en las calles de su ciudad, además comprar ropa, perfumes y calzado de colegio para atribuir a sus ganancias. Por esta razón, ella aprovechó a agradecer a todas las personas que le han ayudado en esos préstamos que la han ayudado a salir adelante como madre soltera.
Ahora no quiere dejar pasar otra oportunidad para volver a invertir, por lo que solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar arroz, frijoles, carne, entre otros productos para invertir más en su comidería. Con este crédito podrá elaborar más comidas para vender y sus ingresos se incrementarán. Al cancelar este préstamo considera solicitar uno nuevo para invertir en la mercadería que ponen a veces en venta como otros ingresos más.
texts.en:
María's joy is very obvious when you hear her talk about the progress of her business. Previously, she had requested loans to invest in raw foods to cook and sell food in the streets of her city, in addition to buying clothing, perfumes, and school dress shoes to contribute to her earnings. For this reason, she took the opportunity to thank everyone who has helped her through those loans, which have helped her keep moving forward as a single mother.

Now, she doesn't want to let another opportunity to invest pass her by, so she is requesting a new loan to buy rice, beans, meat, and other products to invest more in her eatery. With this loan, she will be able to prepare more food to sell, and her earnings will increase. After paying back this loan, she is planning to request another to invest in the merchandise that she sometimes sells as another source of income.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, meat, and other products

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is married with five children and all of them go to school. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and food. Susan has a beauty salon and has been in this business for 11 years. She works in the shop seven days a week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenges include power blackouts and seasonality. She has applied for a loan from MCDT-SACCO to buy cream relaxers, braids, weaves, shampoo and hair treatments. She aspires to own a fully stocked beauty salon and to buy better salon seats and a hair dryer so as to attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy cream relaxers, braids, weaves, shampoo and hair treatments

loans.name: Dilbarhan

texts.ru: Дильбархан, 63 года, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование, работает уборщицей в Управлении Внутренних Дел, получая заработную плату в размере около 6,300 сом (KGS). Дильбархан решила отремонтировать ее дом, поэтому обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS) на покупку извести, краски, шпаклевки. Дильбархан является участником группы "Миножат", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их трое. Доходы от заработной платы она и дальше будет вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Dilbarhan is 63 years old, married and a mother of 2 children. She has a specialized secondary education and works as a cleaning lady at the Internal Affairs Department, earning a salary of 6,300 som (KGS). Dilbarhan decided to repair her house and, thus, requested a loan in the amount of 15,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy lime, paint and plaster. Dilbarhan is a member of the Minozhat group that, besides her, consists of 2 more people, with three of them altogether. She will continue to invest the earnings from her salary into improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy lime, paint and plaster in order to repair her house

loans.name: Pamela's Group

texts.en:
Pamela is a 31-year-old proud mother of six children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of nine farmers in Matete District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Pamela has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Pamela described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing two solar lights, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to invest in a business.

With this loan, Pamela’s Group will be able to plant a total of 4.5 acres of land and purchase a total of 10 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Jacob's Group

texts.en:
Jacob, pictured above, has six children and is always described as a very friendly person, which is why he was selected to become the leader of his group. Jacob is representing his group of seven farmers in Matete District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Jacob has been a farmer for 20 years and, in order to earn enough to feed his family, he decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. His loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which he is very happy to be getting as that means he will now have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study. With the profits from this coming season, Jacob is planning to send his children to school.

A total of 3.25 acres will be planted by Jacob's Group, and between them, they will receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Tegwendé Group

texts.fr: Abzeta, responsable du groupe est mariée et mère de 6 enfants. Elle fait le commerce des pagnes, des chaussures et des soutiens gorge.  Elle exerce cette activité depuis 7 ans. Abzeta et les autres sont à leur 5ème contrat de prêt et jusque là, elles font les remboursements sans difficulté. Abzeta a besoin de ce crédit pour acheter des pagnes, des chaussures et des soutiens gorge pour vendre. Cette brave dame se promène pour faire son commerce et elle a assez de client. Après ses ventes, elle aura un bénéfice qui lui permettra de faire des économies et aussi de s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Abzeta is the group leader and is married with six children. She trades pagnes (colorful West-African fabric), shoes and bras, and has been doing this for the past seven years.

Abzeta and the others are on their fifth loan agreement, and until now made their reimbursements without difficulty. Abzeta needs this loan to buy pagnes, shoes and bras for resale.

This fine lady is an itinerant vendor and has an adequate number of customers. After her sales, she will have profits enabling her to save money and also take care of her family.

loans.use: Buy pagnes, shoes, and bras for resale

loans.name: Fazila

texts.ru: Это Фазила. Она из района Н.Хусрав. Ей 43 лет. Фазила замужняя женщина. У нее один единственный сен. Она занимается животноводством, у нее имеется скотный двор, где она заботится о своих животных. Фазила в течение 3 лет разводит коров. Она хорошо справляется мо своей работой. Животноводческая деятельность является основной, потому что за счет дохода от этого бизнеса она обеспечивает семью. Фазила обратилась за кредитом, чтобы сохранить деятельность и увеличить поголовье скота. Она намерена на заемные средства приобрести пару скотин и расширить животноводческую деятельность.
texts.en: This is Fazila. She is from the N. Khusrav. She is 43 years old. Fazila is a married woman. She has an only son. She is involved in animal husbandry and has a livestock yard, where she takes care of her livestock. Fazila has been breeding cattle for 3 years. She handles her work well. Animal husbandry is her sole business because she provides for her family with the earnings from this business. Fazila requested a loan to retain her business and increase her livestock headcount. She intends to use the loan to buy a couple of livestock heads and expand her business.

loans.use: to increase her livestock headcount and retain her business

loans.name: Janerose

texts.en: Janerose used the previous loan to plaster her house, and is still in the farming business growing food crops like bananas for selling. She is facing hardships of limited capital and climatic changes that hinder the progress of her business. Besides that, she has hopes of having a good family income. Janerose has asked for a loan to complete her house construction.

loans.use: to complete her house construction.

loans.name: Falimanana

texts.fr:
Falimanana a 37ans, il est marié et père de famille. Il a trois enfants qui sont tous scolarisés. Falimanana est un homme très sérieux, passionné et impliqué dans son travail. Il confectionne des petits ensembles pour enfants depuis pas mal de temps. Avant l'an 2000, année d'ouverture de son propre atelier, il était déjà dan ce domaine mais en tant qu' employé.
C'est lui et sa femme qui coupent les tissus,font  les assemblages et coudent: en fait jusqu'à l'emballage. L'emprunt va être utilisé à acheter des tissus, des fils à coudre, toutes les matières premières nécessaires à confectionner des ensembles. En cette saison d'hiver est le moment propice du marché. Ses clients fondamentaux sont les habitants en milieu rural. Son souhait est de pouvoir posséder un atelier de travail séparé de son domicile .
texts.en:
Falimanana is 37 years old, married and father to three children who all attend school.  He is a serious man who works very hard at his business.  For a long time now he has been making clothing outfits for small children.  He began as an employee but in 2000 he opened his own business and began working with his wife.  They cut the fabric, stitch it into outfits and then pack the outfits for sale.

Falimanana's loan will buy fabric, sewing thread and all the other supplies necessary to make the clothes.  His main period of demand is during the winter season and he sells mainly to people living in rural areas.

Falimanana's desire is to have a workshop which is separate from his home.

loans.use: to buy fabric, sewing thread and other supplies for his tailoring business.

loans.name: Sanobar

texts.ru: Санобару 45 лет. Она замужем и у нее одна дочка и один сын. Санобар живет на районе Шахритус. Ее муж настоящее находится вдали от семьи – он на заработках в Российской Федерации, и каждый месяц отправляет им деньги. Сын студент, учится в университете. Дочка замужем и живет отдельно вместе мужем и его семьей. Санобар работает бухгалтером в банке. Сейчас она решила начать еще одну деятельность, заниматься продажей одежды на рынке. Санобар обратилась за кредитом, чтобы за счет кредита перевозит одежды и начать бизнес. Вы можете поддержать Санобар сейчас. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей достичь своей целей.
texts.en: Sanobar is 45 years old. She is married and has one daughter and one son. Sanobar lives in the Shahrituz district. Her husband is currently far away from the family - he works in the Russian Federation and sends money to them every month. Her son is a student and attends a university. Her daughter is married and lives separately with her husband and his family. Sanobar works as an accountant at a bank. Now she decided to start another business and sell clothing at a market. Sanobar requested a loan to bring in clothing and start her business. You can help Sanobar now. The requested loan will help her achieve her goals.

loans.use: to bring in clothing and start her new business

loans.name: Guljahon

texts.ru: Гулжахон замужняя женщина района Шахритус. У нее есть 4 детей. Ей 48 лет. Гулжахон вместе семьей живет на районе Шахритус. Ее Муж в родном районе занимается ремонтом домов. Старший сын находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, по причине что он не нашел себе подходящую работу в стране. Сама Гулжахон занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота в течение 10 лет. Она покупает скота, откармливают их несколько месяцев, и потом вывозит на продажу. Ей в этом помогают ее дети. Целью данного кредита является развитие животноводческой деятельности. Гулжахон планирует увеличить поголовье скота и тем самым улучшить условия жизни семьи. Она надеется на Вашу помощь. Вы можете поддержать ее сейчас.
texts.en: Guljahon is a married woman from the Shahrituz district. She has 4 children. She is 48 years old. Guljahon and her family live in the Shahrituz district. Her husband is involved in repairing houses in his native district. Their oldest son works in the Russian Federation because he could not find suitable work in his country. Guljahon has been involved in breeding cattle for 10 years. She buys livestock, fattens it for several months and then resells them. Her children help her with this business. The goal of this loan is to develop her animal husbandry business. Guljahon plans to increase her livestock headcount and improve her family's life. She relies on Your help. You can support her now.

loans.use: to increase her livestock headcount and develop her business

loans.name: Usikilivu Group

texts.fr: Tabazi est commerçante, trésorière  du groupe solidaire «Usikilivu», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée à un chauffeur, âgée de 48 ans, mère de 4 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle commença son business avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse des divers produits manufacturés et propriétaire d’une boutique dans le centre commercial depuis 5 ans. Elle va acheter du sucre, farine, cartons biscuits, piles, savon Omo, huiles, etc.  Ainsi, elle souhaite accroitre son capital, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish,  elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Tabazi is a retailer and treasurer of the business group 'Usikilivu', which works with the field partner, Hekima.  She is 48 years old, married to a driver and mother to four children who all attend school.  She has been selling various products from a shop in a commercial centre for five years.  She began her business with money provided by her husband.

Tabazi will use her loan to buy sugar, flour, boxes of biscuits, batteries, Omo soap, oil, etc.  This will increase her working capital and help feed and educate her children.

Tabazi is grateful to Hekima for the support they offer to non-bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, boxes of biscuits, batteries, Omo soap, oil, etc for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy food ingredients for resale.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a 33-year-old, married, hardworking woman with 3 children living in Kasese, Uganda.

Joyce operates a general merchandise shop. She has been in this business for 4 years and through it she has managed to earn a living and support her family.  

She is looking forward to growing her business even though she is faced with the challenge of limited capital. She has asked for a loan to buy rice, sugar, sodas, cassava flour and maize flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, sodas, cassava flour and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Prossy

texts.en:
Prossy lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with 3 children and all of them go to school, and she takes care of one additional family member. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food.

Prossy operates a boutique selling second-hand clothes. She has been in this business for the last 5 years, working seven days a week. Her major challenges includes seasonality and transportation. 

She has requested a loan from MCDT – SACCO to buy bales of second-hand clothes. 

Prossy's goal and aspiration is to build a residential house.

loans.use: to buy bales of second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Bonswendtelgo Group

texts.fr:
Madame AMINATA est responsable du groupe BONSWENDTELGO. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 15 ans et le moins âgé a 10 ans.  02 enfants  vont à l’école et elle a 06 personnes en charge.
Madame  vend des gâteaux depuis 06 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Elle compte acheter avec l’argent octroyé, 04 sacs de farine, 03 sacs de sucre et 03 bidons d’huile.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour agrandir son activité. Elle ambitionne  payer une parcelle.
texts.en:
Mrs Aminata is responsible for the Bonswendtelgo group. She is the married mother of two children, the eldest of whom is 15 years old and the youngest ten. Two of the children go to school and she has six persons under her care.

She has been selling cakes for the past six years. She resupplies in surrounding markets, and intends to use the awarded loan to buy four bags of flour, three bags of sugar and three cans of culinary oil.

She wants to use profits from the loan to expand her business, and her ambition is to buy a land-plot.

loans.use: buy with the granted loan four bags of flour, three bags of sugar and three cans of culinary oil.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a 47-year-old married woman with seven children from Mcarthur, Leyte. Three of her children are still attending school.

Imelda runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells basic commodities like candies, biscuits, seasonings, coffee, noodles, canned goods, soft drinks and many other items. 

She lacks the funds to continue to operate her livelihood, so she has requested a loan to buy grocery items for the store like soft drinks, toiletries, biscuits, condiments and beverages. These items will fill Imelda's store and improve its content. In this way, her daily earnings will improve so that she will be able to provide her family with a healthy diet and to continue to send her children to school.
 
Imelda is determined to properly manage her sari-sari store business to become successful.

loans.use: to buy grocery items for her store

loans.name: Welamita Silgo Group

texts.fr:
Mr TANKOUDOUGOU est responsable du groupe WELAMITA SILGO. Il est marié et père de 06 enfants. Le plus âgé a 29 ans et le moins âgé a 11 ans.  06 enfants  vont à l’école et il a 07 personnes en charge.
Monsieur est mécanicien depuis 20 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Il compte acheter avec l’argent octroyé, 10 chambres à air et 05 paquets de rayon.
Il compte épargner les bénéfices du prêt et veut aussi les utiliser pour l’avancement de l’activité. Il ambitionne  être  un grossiste, être riche.
texts.en:
Mr Tankoudougou is responsible for the Welamita Silgo group. He is the married father of six children, the eldest of whom is 29 and the youngest 11 years old. All six children attend school and he has seven persons under his care.

He has been a mechanic for the past 20 years. He resupplies at markets in the area. He will use the awarded loan to buy 10 inner tubes and five packages of bicycle spokes.

He intends to put his profits into savings and use them to improve his business. His ambition is to become an affluent wholesaler.

loans.use: buy with the awarded money 10 inner tubes and five packages of bicycle spokes.

loans.name: Relwende Kaligri Group

texts.fr:
Monsieur BANGRE  est responsable du groupe RELWENDE KALIGRI. Il est marié et père de 06 enfants. Le plus âgé a 21 ans et le moins âgé a 01 ans. 04 enfants vont à l’école et il a 09 personnes en charge.
Monsieur fait du jardinage depuis 40 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Il compte acheter avec l’argent octroyé, 02 sacs d’engrais, 02 boites de semences d’oignons et 02 boites de semences d’aubergines.
Il veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour épargner. Il ambitionne agrandir son activité de jardinage et ajouter l’élevage.
texts.en:
Mr. Bangre is responsible for the Relwende Kaligri group. He is the married father of six children, the eldest of whom is 21 and the youngest less than one year old. Four of the children attend school, and he has nine persons under his care.

He has been a crop gardener for the past 40 years. He resupplies at markets in the area. He intends to use the granted loan to buy two bags of fertilizer, two boxes of onion seeds and two boxes of eggplant seeds.

He intends to put profits from the loan into savings, and aims to expand his gardening business and add livestock breeding to his activities.

loans.use: use the granted loan to buy two bags of fertilizer, two boxes of onion seeds and two boxes of eggplant seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more beers, sodas, soap, sugar and salt to sell.

loans.name: Kiswendsida Silgo Group

texts.fr:
Madame BASGA est responsable du groupe KISWENDSIDA SILGO. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 12 ans et le moins âgé a 01 an. 01 enfant va à l’école et elle a 10 personnes en charge.
Madame fait de la préparation du dolo depuis 03 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Elle compte acheter avec l’argent octroyé,  02 sacs de mil rouge.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour aider sa famille et épargner. Elle ambitionne être la plus grande dolotière  de son village.
texts.en:
Mrs. Basga is responsible for the Kiswendsida Silgo group. She is the married mother of four children, the eldest of whom is 12 and the youngest less than one year old. One child goes to school and she has 10 persons under her care.

She has been making dolo (a kind of beer made from millet or sorghum) for the past three years. She resupplies at markets in the area, and intends to use the granted loan to buy two bags of red millet.

She wants to use proceeds from the loan to support her family and increase her savings. Her ambition is to become the biggest dolo brewer in her village.

loans.use: use the granted loan to buy two bags of red millet

loans.name: Zemstaaba Silgo Group

texts.fr:
Mr SAMBO est responsable du groupe ZEMSTAABA SILGO. Il est marié et père de 15 enfants. Le plus âgé a 35 ans et le moins âgé a 03 ans.  06  enfants  vont à l’école et il a 09 personnes en charge.
Monsieur fait de l’élevage depuis 50 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Il compte acheter avec l’argent octroyé, 03 moutons et 20 à 30 poules.
Il veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour aider à la scolarisation de ses enfants. Il ambitionne  être  un grand éleveur et aider à l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Sambo is responsible for the Zemstaaba Silgo group. He is the married father of 15 children,  the eldest of whom is 35 and the youngest less than three years old. Six of the children attend school and he has nine persons under his care.

He has been a livestock farmer for the past 50 years. He gets his supplies from nearby markets, and will use the granted loan to buy three sheep and 20 to 30 hens.

He intends to use proceeds from the loan to assist in his children's education. His ambition is to become a great rancher and help develop his family.

loans.use: use the granted loan to buy three sheep and from 20 to 30 hens.

loans.name: Abigael's Group

texts.en:
Abigael is 40 years old and has 6 children. She is a group leader and is representing her group of 11 farmers in Matete District, Kenya. 

Abigael has been farming with One Acre Fund for some years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to earn enough to feed her family. Although she described her last harvest as poor due to bad weather conditions, she believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Abigael has also decided to purchase two solar lights as part of her loan, which she is very excited about as it will allow her to have light during the dark hours for her children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that Abigael's Group will be able to receive a total of 12 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 5.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Laura Isabel

texts.es: Laura tiene 44 años de edad, ella es made soltera, su hijo tiene 22 años y esta estudiando, Laura vive en el campo con sus padres, 3 hermanos y su hijo. Laura desde muy joven se dedica a la crianza de animales y al jornal de trabajos del campo. Desde hace 3 años  atrás Laura trabaja de vendedora en una tienda. Laura necesita el dinero del credito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos  ya que cuenta que este negocio si le deja buena ganancia, Laura comenta que su hijo esta a punto de terminar sus estudios para obtener el titulo de tecnologo en enferneria y Laura tiene la aspiracion de seguir en su negocio mejorarlo y asi obtener mas ingresos para pagar lo que falta del estudio de su hijo y asi verle convertirse en un profecional.
texts.en:
Laura is 44 years old. She is single mother; her son is 22 years old and in education. Laura lives in the countryside with her parents, three siblings, and her son. 

Since a young age, Laura has worked raising animals and doing other work in the fields. For three years, Laura has also worked as a salesperson in a shop. 

Laura needs this loan in order to buy pigs and her business with these animals gives her good profits.

Laura says that her son is about to finish his education and earn his degree as a nurse technician. Laura herself wants to continue improving her business and increasing her income in order to pay the rest of her son’s education and see him become a professional.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
Andrea es de la ciudad de la ciudad de Luque, ella está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder ser una profesional exitosa que ayude a las demás personas.
Ella comenta que le gustaría poder culminar sus estudios y trabajar en una empresa como contadora independiente.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de estudios, como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la ayuda que recibe de poder mejorar su vida a través de sus estudios.
texts.en:
Andrea is from the city of Luque. She is studying for a degree in accounting. She is working as hard as she can in order to be a successful professional who can help other people.

Andrea says that she would like to finish her studies and work as a freelance accountant for other businesses.

Andrea is applying for this loan in order to continue paying tuition fees. She is grateful for this help that will allow her to improve her life through her studies.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Martin's Group

texts.en:
Martin, pictured above, has 7 children and is always described as a very friendly person, which is why he was selected to become the leader of his group. Martin is representing his group of 12 farmers in Matete District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Martin has been a farmer for 14 years and in order to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, he decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. His loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which he is very happy to be getting as that means he will now reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore, save more money. With the profits from this coming season, Martin is planning to save more money for the future.

A total of 6.25 acres will be planted by Martin's Group, and between them they will receive a total of 6 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more beans, rice and maize to sell.

loans.name: Ba Gan Chaung Village - Group 1

texts.en:
Pictured above are the CBO members from Ba Gan Chaung - Group 1, named (from left to right) Aye, Al, Own, Win and Tin. The featured borrower, Tin, has a 5 acre farm in the Delta region of Myanmar, and like many farmers in this area, income is very low before the harvest season. The loan will help him purchase the necessary farming resources he needs to harvest his crops. Tin is 56 years old, married, and supports a family of four (two children), who are in 9th grade and 10th grade. Part of the family’s income goes towards funding the children's education. Tin and his family hope to send their children to university after they finish high school.

The fund will help 26 borrowers in the village. The CBO leaders oversee this group, and they will purchase farming essentials for harvest time with this loan. Ba Gan Chaung - Group 1 Village’s main focus is crop farming, as well as other seasonal foods. They also raise livestock, such as ducks and pigs, and grow plantation crops, such as flowers and lime trees, for additional income.

loans.use: To purchase petrol for farm equipment, fertilizers and hire farm staff during harvest time.

loans.name: Elijah

texts.en:
Elijah is 56 years old, married and supports four family members. He has been practicing farming for the last six years and the business earns him a monthly income of KES 11,000. 

Elijah has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya, which he plans to use to open a retail shop to supply household goods in the region. 

He plans to use the anticipated profit to repay the loan and expand his farming.

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to open a retail shop to supply household goods in the region

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy solar panels for the cinema hall.

loans.name: Respah's Group

texts.en:
Respah is a 46-year-old proud mother of six children. She is a group leader, often described as a very experienced farmer, and is representing her group of 10 farmers in Matete District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Respah has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Respah described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Respah’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.75 acres of land and purchase a total of eight solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Cissy

texts.en: Cissy is married with two children. She also takes care of her sister and brother. She resides in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. She gets additional income from farming. She sells secondhand shoes and clothes at the market to all kinds of people on a retail basis. She has been in this business for 12 years, and she works six days a week. She has applied for a loan from MCDT-SACCO to buy bales of secondhand shoes and clothes. Her major business challenges include transportation and seasonality. She is aspiring to build rental houses. Her monthly expenses include medication and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy bales of secondhand shoes and clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy quality seedlings for planting and subsequent high production.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en: Rachael lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children and one goes to school. She sells secondhand clothes on a retail basis. She sells her products door-to-door. She takes care of one additional family member. She has been in business for the last eight years. She works six days a week. Her major challenge is transportation and seasonality. She has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy a bale of secondhand clothes. She would like to educate her children up to the university level. She lives in her own house and the family has no access to electricity and piped water. Her major expenses monthly include food and school fees.

loans.use: to buy a bale of secondhand clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fertilizer and certified seed for planting before the planting season is over so as to get a good harvest for sale in the market and for his home consumption.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 36-year-old male who is married with four children, three of whom are attending school in Kasese, Uganda. He deals in the produce business selling rice, millet flour, maize flour and coconuts. He has been in that business for four years and gets additional income from a motorcycle transport business supplementing it with the small salary he earns. Robert dreams of building a permanent house for his family, thus requesting credit to buy building materials such as cement and doors and pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement, and doors, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: A sus 55 años de edad Juan es un hombre casado, tiene una hija de 9 años y un hijo de 11 años de edad que  asisten a la escuela, Juan y su esposa se dedican al jornal y a sembrar pequeñas huertas de papas y otros productos. Juan necesita el dinero del credito para  comprar abono y fugicidas para que sus platitas crezcan sanas. Juan vive en la casa de su cuñado y comenta que a futuro le gustaria comprarse una casa propia para su familia.
texts.en:
At 55 years old, Juan is a married man. He has a 9 year old daughter and an 11 year old son who both go to school. Juan and his wife earn their living as farm laborers and from planting potatoes and other products. 

Juan needs the loan money to buy fertilizer and fungicides so that his little plants grow healthy. Juan lives in his brother-in-law's house and says that in the future he would like to buy a home for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay university costs.

loans.name: Rustamzhon

texts.en: Rustamzhon is an active boy. He was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1992. He is living in a district near the capital of the country. He is single and lives with parents. He is a student at University. He studies medicine. He is well known among students and friends. He tries to learn more about his major and gets information from diverse resources. He reads works of the world’s scientific and technical researchers. He wants to be useful to people and treat them. Unfortunately, his parents recently have no money to the pay tuition fee for his studies. He asks for a loan from Kiva lenders to pay his higher education cost. He hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to pay his higher education cost

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es estudiante de la carrera de farmacia, está casada y tiene dos hijas, ella comenta que pone su mejor esfuerzo para poder superarse y poder ayudar a su marido y ser ejemplo de sus hijas.
Está estudiando muy duro y gracias a ello le está yendo muy bien en su carrera.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Maria is a at university studying for a degree in pharmacy. She is married and has two daughters. She describes how she tries her hardest to get ahead, help her husband and be an example for her daughters.

She is studying very hard and her degree is therefore going very well. 

She is asking for this loan to pay her university tuition fees. It will also allow her to continue in her current job. She is grateful for this opportunity that will help her develop.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition fees.

loans.name: Zenovia

texts.es:
La socia Zenovia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar verduras,arroz, pollo y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Zenovia continues with her food business.  She is a hard-working entrepreneur who supports her children through her work.  Her dream is to open a restaurant.

The loan she is requesting is to buy vegetables, rice, chicken and meat.  She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, rice, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Marcia Paulina

texts.es: Paulina esta pasando por sus 55 años de edad, Paulina es divorciada y tiene un hijo de 18 años de edad que asiste al colegio. Paulina vive con su madre y su hijo en una casita vieja. Paulina comenta que se dedica  a la crianza de animales y es asi como obtiene sus ingresos. Paulina  siempre ha luchado sola por su hijo y ademas vela por el bienestar de su madre que es de la tercera edad. Paulina necesita el dinero del credito para invertir en la compra de pollos que los cria en el patio de su casa. Paulina tiene la aspiracion de comprar mas pollos y demas animales para que las ganancias sean mayores. Paulina desea que su hijo termine sus estudios, consiga un buen trabajo,  para que no tenga que pasar las necesidades que paso toda su vida Paulina.
texts.en:
Paulina is turning 55, is divorced and has an 18-year-old son who attends school.  She lives with her mother and son in an old little house and says she raises animals to earn an income.  She always has been alone raising her son and watching out for the well-being of her elderly mother.

Paulina is in need of a loan to buy chickens to raise in the patio of her house.  She aspires to buying more chickens and other animals to earn more profit.  She wants her son to finish his education and get a good job so he does not have to want for anything in life like Paulina did.

loans.use: To buy chickens.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto continua con sus estudios en la carrera de contabilidad, comenta que es muy sacrificado tener que estudiar y trabajar al mismo tiempo, pero que pone todo de si para poder crecer, comenta que su préstamo anterior le fue de mucha ayuda y con ello pudo cubrir ciertos gastos que tenia.
Hoy pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe.
texts.en:
Alberto continues studying for an accounting degree.  He says it is very self-sacrificing to study and work at the same time but he is putting his all into getting ahead.  He claims the previous loan was of great help as he was able to cover several of his costs.

Today he is requesting a new loan to cover education costs and continue his studies as he has until now.  He is grateful for this new opportunity.

loans.use: To pay education costs.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de pulseras y aretes,la socia es una mujer luchadora y trabajadora,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el local para vender las pulseras,collares y aretes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pulseras,aretes y collares.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Francisca continues with her business selling bracelets and earrings.  She is a hard-working, determined woman who dreams of expanding her stall to sell bracelets, necklaces and earrings.  She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy bracelets, earrings and necklaces.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La socia Maria Elena se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,la socia le gustaria tener otro restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras,arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Maria Elena is continuing with her business of selling food. Through this business she want to help her family get ahead. She would also like to have another restaurant. Maria Elena is asking for this loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and meat. 

She would be happy to receive the loan and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and meat.

loans.name: Projet Rizicole Chihire Group

texts.fr: En tant que Ingénieur agronome de formation et chercheur sur le riz, Polycarpe a commencé cette activité en 2003 dans le marais de Lwiro et a reçu le premier lot de semence de la société PHARMAKINA. Ce qui lui plait dans cette activité c'est la possibilité de conserver le produit une fois transformé malgré que cela exige un certain coût. Même si jusque-là, le couple du PROJET RIZICOLE CHIHIRE est locataire de champs qu'il occupe, il exprime cependant leur idéal quant à l'atteinte d'une grande production afin de servir plus aisément leur communauté et leur famille. Sur la photo prise dans l'un de leurs champs, Polycarpe est accompagné de son épouse Nadine.
texts.en: Polycarpe is an agricultural engineer by profession and a rice researcher. He began this activity in the Lwiro marsh in 2003 and got his first batch of seeds from the Pharmakina company. What he likes about this business is the possibility of conserving the product once it has been transformed, even if this entails a certain cost. While the couple from the Projet Rizicole Chihire has until now rented the field it occupies, it has expressed its ultimate wish to achieve a significant production so that it can provide more easily for its cummunity and families. The photo, which is taken in one of their fields, shows Polycarpe with his wife, Nadine.

loans.use: to prepare the harvest and hoe the marsh field, pay for labor and buy farming inputs for mountain rice.

loans.name: Fariza

texts.ru: Фариза молодая 28 летняя мама. Она развелась с мужем и маленьким ребенком на руках. Фариза проживает вместе мамой в городе Душанбе. Она очень ответственная и целеустремленная женщина с большими планами на жизнь. Фариза обеспечивает ребенка, предоставляя услуги портнихи у себя дома.  Она принимает заказы на  шитье женской одежды уже 5 лет. Фариза просит кредит, чтобы купить ткани и другие швейные принадлежности для расширения деятельности. Она одна зарабатывает, и обеспечить маму и ребенка. Вы можете поддержать ее с финансовыми трудностями.
texts.en:
Fariza is a young 28-year-old mom. She is divorced from her husband and has a small child.
Fariza lives in Dushanbe city together with her mother. She is very responsible and ambitious woman, and she has big plans for her life. Fariza provides for her child by offering dressmaker services from her home. For 5 years now she has been accepting orders for women's clothing. 
Fariza is asking for a loan to purchase fabrics and other sewing supplies she needs in order to expand her business. 
She is the sole provider for her mother and child. You can help her with her financial difficulties.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Datio est la femme à gauche tenant dans sa main la corde attache au mouton.
Datio est une malienne âgée de 54 ans,  veuve, mère de 06 enfants dont 1 est scolarise et 5 non scolarises .Datio est une éleveuse de moutons.
